name: places/ChIJWxixXjv2wokRwq_ABMo0gbs
formattedAddress: 229 W 109th St, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 229 W 109th St, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: We were so glad that we chose to have Allison photograph our wedding! We felt totally a ease with her. She photographed our engagements, and was able to get beautiful, glowing, and tender shots even though the day we picked was hot and muggy. I almost never like photos of myself--I'm don't feel very photogenic--but Allison's photographs made me look beautiful. She has a gift! At our wedding, Allison was self-directed, creating a good mix of portraits of the wedding party, details from the reception, and candids. Our wedding photographs are gorgeous, and we are so happy with the memories Allison captured!

originalText.text: Allison did a wonderful job taking our engagement pictures.  She was enthusiastic and full of energy  which made the time spent getting photographed fly by.  She went above and beyond to get the perfect shot and we loved her ability to capture our emotions at this happy and exciting time. Allison has an eye for detail and is very creative making her photographs unique and interesting to look at.  We are so pleased with our experience working with Allison and absolutely love that we have such great photographs to look at and remember our engagement as well as our time living in New York City.

text.text: Allison did a wonderful job taking our engagement pictures.  She was enthusiastic and full of energy  which made the time spent getting photographed fly by. originalText.text:
Allison was absolutely great to work with and all of the photos were phenomenal! We did our engagements in NYC with Allison and were so pleased with how they turned out that we asked if she would do our wedding in Washington, DC as well. Our wedding took place over two days and Allison was key in making sure that we did not miss a moment! Not only was she extremely professional but she knew exactly what she was doing and we were able to get all of the pictures that we wanted and many more!

Would highly recommend especially if you want someone who will be upbeat and a joy to be around!

text.text:

Would highly recommend especially if you want someone who will be upbeat and a joy to be around!

originalText.text: Allison is a joy to work with. Not only was she cheerful at 7:30 in the morning on a frigid winter Saturday when we did our shoot, but she was also professional and well prepared, having scouted our suggested photo shoot locations the day before and even found some fun surprise spots for photo ops we hadn't yet discovered. My fiancé Ben and I think about our engagement shoot often and in addition to being incredibly pleased with the photos and gallery/ordering experience, we have fond memories of the whole day. It's evident in Allison's demeanor that she loves to capture love and it shows in her work. We felt like we were just on a really fun (early morning) date, laughing and being ourselves, and Allison was in the background, snapping pictures and giving suggestions when appropriate. I would recommend her to any bride or groom!

originalText.text: Allison is an incredible wedding and portrait photographer. She is so professional, kind, and personable, and everyone in our wedding party was impressed with her leadership during our photo session. She is very organized, efficient, and fun, and we were very happy with the results—the photos are gorgeous and we will treasure them forever. Highly recommended!
